abstract: Segolene Royal, French senior cabinet minister and former romantic partner of French Pres Francois Hollande, is back in corridors of power as unofficial vice-president and first lady; has been appointed minister for ecology, sustainable development and energy, and often accompanies or stands in for Hollande on formal occasions.
lead_paragraph: The French government offers neither role, but President Hollande’s former political and romantic partner fulfills aspects of each in a demonstration of their very “evolved” relationship.

headline.main: Ségolène Royal: A Sort-of Vice President, Not-Quite First Lady
headline.print_headline: A Sort-of Vice President, Not-Quite First Lady

snippet: The French government offers neither role, but President Hollande’s former political and romantic partner fulfills aspects of each in a demonstration of their very “evolved” relationship.
